name: Abu Jafar Saifullah
title: Software Engineer
bio: Passionate Software Engineer with a strong foundation in Software Engineering fundamentals and a drive for innovation. Currently seeking Ph.D. and Masters opportunities in Software Engineering, AI/ML, and Security.
academicInterests: I am actively seeking opportunities for Ph.D. and Masters programs in the fields of Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, and Computer Security. My research interests include software quality assurance, intelligent systems, and secure software development.
